raw_comment: We noticed that the southern states got leaves first, and the northern states got leaves last, second to the mountain ranges. We wondered what exact date the leaves would reach us in Wisconsin. We think that what is going in this graph is it is showing us when leaves will get to different areas around the U.S.
ace_sentences: The southern states got leaves first.
The northern states got leaves last.
The mountain ranges got leaves second to last.
We wondered about the exact date when the leaves would reach us in Wisconsin.
We think that the graph shows when leaves will reach different areas in the U.S.
